name: A day in the life of Link (Ari)
name_original: A day in the life of Link (Ari)
description:
Short, kinda silly game made for the BitsyGameJam at Lusófona University. I had the pleasure of programming this for my classmates' gorgeous art and quirky storyline.

PRO tip: Talk to every NPC more than once. And again. And again. And again...
